meta_data.description: 1380 Sq. Ft. - Rent 2 BHK Apartment / Flat in Supertech Supernova, Sector 94 Noida * 18 Property & locality photos * Furnished * - 28th floor (out of 43). View contact number for free. Click for complete details on 99acres.com

structured_data.description: A 2 bhk flat for rent in sector 94 noida close to all basic civic amenities is available for just 68,000 in supertech supernova, noida. This flat consists of 2 bathrooms & 1 balcony. This flat is constructed on 1380 sq.Ft. Area. Parking available: 1 covered parking & 1 open parking. This flat lies on the 28th floor of a 43 storey building. Well maintained 1-5 years property. This is a furnished flat. Furnishing options provided - 14 light, 4 fan, 3 ac, 1 tv, 2 bed, 4 wardrobe, 3 geyser, 1 sofa, 1 washing machine, 1 stove, 1 fridge, 1 water purifier, 1 microwave, 1 modular kitchen, 1 chimney, 1 dining table, 1 curtains and 1 exhaust fan. Property will be leased for 11 months from fri, 18 apr 2025 to families, single men and single women only with a notice of 1 month for a duration of 11 months. With all the highlighted features, we are asking for 68,000 monthly and is negotiable. Refundable security deposit is 136000. The property comes with reserved parking, piped-Gas, intercom facility, power back-Up, water storage, security / fire alarm and feng shui / vaastu compliant all inclusive in one. Supertech supernova is designed very well to provide modern facilities such as swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, shopping centre, grade a building, cctv surveillance, lift(s), security personnel, maintenance staff and visitor parking. You would also like to know that the property also features rain water harvesting, corner property, pet friendly, wheelchair friendly and in a gated society. Power backup: Full. The flat faces north-East. Marble is used in the floor throughout the residence.
